name: Stop2
_source: #Morrissey: I don’t know what you want me to do.
#Morrissey: My forces are depleted and they’re too far away.
#Benson: She’s your own sister and you won’t even raise a hand to help her!
#Morrissey: Don’t get sanctimonious with me when you don’t even know the full story. I won’t help them, and that’s the end of it, and you can’t help them, so just leave.
